On this page

This quickstart guide will help you set up MovingBox and begin cataloging your items in just a few minutes.

Download and Install ​

Download the App

Get MovingBox from the [App Store](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/movingbox-ai/id6742755218)

Choose Your Plan

Start with our free plan or select a premium option: - **Free**: 50 AI image analyses with unlimited manual entries - **Monthly**: $4.99/month - **Annual**: $44.99/year (7-day free trial) - **Lifetime**: $129.99 one-time payment 
::: tip
You can start with the free plan and upgrade anytime! Even after using your 50 AI analyses, you can continue to add items manually.
:::

App Onboarding Process ​

Welcome Screen

Open the app and tap the "Get Started" button to begin 
::: note
There might be a slight delay after tapping the button as MovingBox enables iCloud, checks for existing inventory data, and restores subscription purchases in the background.
:::

Create Your Home

- Take or upload a photo of your home - Add a friendly name like "Main Street Home" - Tap "Continue" to proceed

Create Your First Location

- Take or upload a photo of a room or area in your home - Give it a name (e.g., "Living Room", "Kitchen", "Garage") - Add an optional description - Tap "Continue" to proceed

Add Your First Item

- Take a photo of an item in your home - Wait briefly while AI analyzes the image - Review and adjust the AI-generated details if needed - Tap "Save" to add the item to your inventory

Enable Notifications

Choose whether to allow notifications from MovingBox 
::: tip
Notifications can alert you about special occurrences such as insurance policy expiration, warranty expiration, exceeding insurance policy limits, and more. Not all notification features have been implemented yet.
:::

Complete Setup

Onboarding is now complete! You can now access the main app and continue adding locations and items to build your home inventory.

Take More Photos ​

Add More Items

1. Tap the 'Add item' button in the tab bar 2. Point your camera at an item 3. Tap the shutter button to capture 4. Let AI identify and document the item

Review and Save

1. Review the AI-generated details 2. Make any necessary adjustments 3. Tap 'Save' to add to your inventory

Add Location Details

1. Tap on the newly added item 2. Select 'Edit' 3. Assign it to a room or create a new location 4. Add any custom labels if needed

Quick Tips ​

Batch Add Items

Use the multi-capture mode to photograph several items in sequence

Add Home Details

Set up your home profile to organize items by location

Enable Cloud Backup

iCloud sync is enabled by default to protect your inventory data

Customize Categories

Create custom labels to organize items your way

What's Next? ​

  • Explore the Core Features to learn about all MovingBox capabilities
  • Check out our AI Details page to understand how our AI recognition works
  • Review common Use Cases to make the most of MovingBox
